item.description:
The old go-to midweek trivia classic is on again this week. The fall beer selection should be here and the nachos aren't bad either. (and who can say no to the gift cards from winning first and second place last time!)

Come on down as we make another showing.

Saying you aren't any good at trivia is no excuse not to come out. Do you watch TV? Movies? Listen to Music? Eat? Know a little history? Geography?

Every little bit helps and great conversation is guaranteed.

Game starts close to 8:30 and runs for about 2 hours!

See you there.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for me with a Meetup sign
item.name: Trivia @ Union Station
